description: ocr deidentification to remove specific texts from images

source.name: dicom_obj
source.description: input dicom object. the dicom in general should be US data

args.name: sensitive_list
args.description: list of dicom tag name to be removed from image, default value is ['PatientName', 'PatientID', 'PatientBirthDate']

args.name: rectangle_roi
args.description: the x, y, width and height of the mask

args.name: roi_only
args.description: if only use manually defined mask

args.name: use_gpu
args.description: if use GPU for text detection and recognition

output.name: data
output.description: output 2D image which has no sensitive texts
